alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 28 at 6:19PM AKDT until April 29 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 45 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Conditions have improved briefly this afternoon, but will get worse late tonight through Saturday morning as another band of falling snow moves over the area. Its possible that low visibility in snow and blowing snow could continue through the day Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
